title.en: Sakura Special Collab: 2.95% chance to get one of following Jyanshis: Gintoki Sakata, Kotaro Katsura, Tatsuma Sakamoto, Shinsuke Takasugi.

characterDescription.en:
Li Yang & Yui Yagi & Yuan Xiao
The top 3 most used characters recently (excluding Ichihime & Miki) according to 雀魂rank(@Jantama_rank)
